channel.title: Need Compiler help please!
channel.description:
OKay Im Starting on a "delta" "317"
How do my Compiler looks:
@echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_02\bin/javac.exe" -d ./bin ./src/*.java pause
Which Version's of java do i Got:
Jdk1.6.0_25
Please someone Can Give me the right code?
when I press "compile.bat" it says
javac: file not found: .\src\*.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

item.title: Need Compiler help please!
item.dc:creator: @MR_Terror MR Terror
item.description:
@MR_Terror wrote:

lulz here u go:

@echo off title Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_25\bin/javac.exe" -d ./bin ./src/*.java pause

Read full topic

item.title: Need Compiler help please!
item.dc:creator: @nietmeer nietmeer
item.description:
@nietmeer wrote:

[quote=“ultimateGodz, post:3, topic:429523”]use this one will work all the time i promis

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit[/quote]

Nope the code doesnt worked for me :S

Read full topic

item.title: Need Compiler help please!
item.dc:creator: @ultimateGodz ultimateGodz
item.description:
@ultimateGodz wrote:

use this one will work all the time i promis

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic

item.title: Need Compiler help please!
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

If you have windows 7, and want to see what Java you have, go to:

Computer\C:\Program (x86)\Java , or this, Computer\C:\Program Files\Java

now when you’re in the “Java” folder you should see a map, that maybe will look like this: jdk.1.6.0_20
That means that my Java is a 1.6.0_20 version, what you will have to do is to change that code in your compiler
to the code that you have in your “Java” folder.

This is how my code looks like: "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac" -d bin -cp deps/*; -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java

(C: is my hard drive)

Read full topic

use -help for a list of possible options
